objects.name: Analytic 1569
objects.description: Detects abnormal HID device enumeration via I/O Registry (ioreg -p IOUSB) and keystroke injection targeting AppleScript, osascript, or PowerShell equivalents. Defender correlates new USB device connections with rapid script execution.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: New IOUSB keyboard/HID device enumerated with suspicious attributes

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: osascript, AppleScript, or Python execution triggered immediately after HID connection

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Whitelist of AppleScripts expected in the environment, to minimize false positives.
Timeframe between HID injection and script execution considered suspicious.
